author: Victor Garcia
title: Coronavirus patient says hydroxychloroquine saved his life
description: Coronavirus patient Rio Giardinieri joined "The Ingraham Angle" and spoke about how hydroxychloroquine changed his fight against the virus.
content:
Coronavirus patient Rio Giardinieri joined "The Ingraham Angle" and spoke about how he believes hydroxychloroquine changed his fight against the virus.
"I'm not a scientist. I'm not a doctor. But I know when I'm sitting here in pain and they've tried all kin… [+1864 chars]
